fb2.Name: Kai
fb2.Text: Miss Anna! Mr. Diaz just told me you're leaving the village for three months!! It's not true, right?

fb2.Name: Kai
fb2.Text: Well... more like I overheard him talking to Phoenix about it. But still!

fb2.Name: Kai
fb2.Text: He's lying, right? You never leave for more than two weeks at a time, so three months is just absurd!

fb2.Name: Anna
fb2.Text: This export is going to a town that's a little further away, that's all. I'll be back soon.

fb2.Name: Elm
fb2.Text: (Hm... it doesn't sound like their conversation finished, but I can't hear anything else.)

fb2.Name: Elm
fb2.Text: (Maybe these flashbacks have some sort of limit to them.)

item desired.Text: ... so really, ma belle, I think it imperative that you reconsider your choice.

item desired.Name: Anna
item desired.Text: Please, Felix. I've told you many times already. My decision is final.

item desired.Name: Felix
item desired.Text: Your decision has been made with greate haste, Belle. Perhaps I could -

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Anna! And Felix... oh, sorry, are we interrupting something?

item desired.Name: Anna
item desired.Text: Oh! Good afternoon, Kai. And who might you be?

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: (So it is her.)

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: I'm... Elm. I'm Kai's friend.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Yes! A new friend. I'm showing them around the village.

item desired.Name: Felix
item desired.Text: Elm! What a splendid name. It reminds me of... green... nature... leaves...

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: Try trees.

item desired.Name: Felix
item desired.Text: Yes! Precisely. Trees. I will call you Tree. I think it suits you quite well.

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: That's my last name, actually.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: So what were you two talking about just now?

item desired.Name: Anna
item desired.Text: Ah... well. Felix here was just running his little campaign speel for me. Again.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Ah.

item desired.Name: Felix
item desired.Text: This village has been without a mayor for a week now. We're falling into shambles!

item desired.Name: Felix
item desired.Text: Someone needs to reassume power now. And if no one else is going to do it, it may as well be me.

item desired.Name: Felix
item desired.Text: Do you not think so, young Tree?

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: (Ah. I'd almost forgotten about everything with the mayor.)

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: Uh... I guess?

item desired.Name: Anna
item desired.Text: Don't mind him, Elm.

item desired.Name: Felix
item desired.Text: Hmph. Well, heed my word, Belle. I'll let you return to your work now.

item desired.Name: Anna
item desired.Text: Actually I can't.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Can't what? Return to your work?

item desired.Name: Anna
item desired.Text: Yes. I can't find my horse-riding permit. Perhaps it got stolen.

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: ... Horse? Horse-riding permit? Do people steal those in this village??

item desired.Name: Anna
item desired.Text: Maybe. Regardless, I can't send out these exports without it.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Oh no. Everyone really is losing everything today.

item desired.Name: Anna
item desired.Text: Everyone?

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: I lost my hunting knife this morning and Hank's animal feed got misplaced.

item desired.Name: Felix
item desired.Text: What did I say! The town's falling into shambles. We're falling apart.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Not for long, we aren't! Elm's been helping out. They're really good at finding things.

item desired.Name: Kai
item desired.Text: Maybe we can help you, Anna!

item desired.Name: Anna
item desired.Text: Really? That would be amazing. I'd like to get this shipment out as soon as possible.

item desired.Name: Elm
item desired.Text: Of course.

item returned.Name: Anna
item returned.Text: Where did you find it? I've been looking all over for it.

item returned.Name: Kai
item returned.Text: We found it outside! I guess you must've dropped it while you were walking.

item returned.Name: Anna
item returned.Text: Really? I swear I made at least seven rounds outside. Maybe my vision's just going these days.

item returned.Name: Elm
item returned.Text: (Kai's covering for him. I guess he wants to keep the peace as much as possible.)

item returned.Name: Kai
item returned.Text: Elm here's just really good at finding things, Anna. I certainly didn't spot it on my way over.

item returned.Name: Anna
item returned.Text: I see. Well, thank you Elm.

item returned.Name: Anna
item returned.Text: I'm sorry I can't stay for longer, but I really must be on my way.

item returned.Name: Kai
item returned.Text: Of course! Go ahead, Anna. We'll hold the fort down while you're gone.

item returned.Name: Anna
item returned.Text: Haha, always so spritely. I trust you to handle the villagers while I'm gone, Kai.

item returned.Name: Kai
item returned.Text: Yes ma'am! Wait -- you won't be gone for as long as last time, will you?

item returned.Name: Anna
item returned.Text: That was a special case. I'll be back soon.

item returned.Name: Kai
item returned.Text: Okay!! I'll see you when you get back.

item returned.Name: Elm
item returned.Text: Have a safe trip, Miss Anna.

item returned.Name: Anna
item returned.Text: I will. Thank you again, Elm. You've quite saved me.

item returned.Name: Felix
item returned.Text: Yes, well, I do believe I should be on my way as well. Good day, you two.
